inclusion.criterion: Hypercholesterolemic low-moderate risk patients without hypolipidemic drugs for at least one month.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Age ≥18 years on stable AHA step 1 diet.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: For primary prevention, LDL > 130 mg/dL and for secondary prevention LDL>70 and <100mg/dL.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: CPK, ALT and AST < 1.5 x upper limit of normal at baseline.
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Treatment with hypolipidemic drugs during the last month.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Oral corticosteroids, NSAID, COX-1 inhibitors and other antiplatelet drugs.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Women with childbearing potential unless on safe contraception.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient is a 3-day-old female infant with jaundice that started one day ago. She was born at 34w of gestation and kept in an incubator due to her gestational age.
